backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user access control, subscription status, binders, cards, and storage logic with admin-gated subscription updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing required sticker-generation features and static asset integration.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of prewritten summaries for all frontend source files used for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes with global styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app handling authentication, profile loading, navigation, and screen rendering.
frontend/src/components/binder/BinderFra: UI component rendering a textured binder page frame with optional theme overrides.
frontend/src/components/binder/BinderRin: Overlay component displaying binder rings graphic for visual realism.
frontend/src/components/binder/PageSwipe: Container enabling swipe gestures and animated page-flip transitions between pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/AccentCol: Selector component allowing users to change the global accent color from preset options.
frontend/src/hooks/useLoadingDiagnostics: React hook that logs delayed loading diagnostics based on state and a timeout threshold.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, binders, subscriptions, and photocards through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSwipeGesture.ts: Hook providing touch and mouse handlers to detect left and right swipe gestures with a threshold.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and custom color utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/screens/AddCardScreen.tsx: UI screen for uploading a photocard with validation, preview, and progress-driven upload via useAddPhotocard.
frontend/src/screens/BinderLibraryScreen: Screen for listing, creating, and deleting binders, handling subscription limits, errors, and loading diagnostics.
frontend/src/screens/BinderSettingsScree: Screen for editing a binder’s theme settings and saving updates via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/screens/BinderViewScreen.ts: Displays binder details and paginated cards with drag‑and‑drop reordering and navigation controls.
frontend/src/screens/EditCardScreen.tsx: Canvas-based editor for adding, moving, and modifying stickers on a card image before saving.
Normalizes backend errors into user-friendly messages, including binder limit handling.
frontend/src/utils/promiseTimeout.ts: Provides a wrapper that adds a timeout to any promise to prevent indefinite waiting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and binder-specific design tokens.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for generating vintage-style sticker PNG assets, listing schema info, existing features, and required images. Contains no code logic, only configuration and metadata.
